data.eml:eml: Two new Patagonian species of Atrichopogon (Meloehelea) (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marino, Pablo I., Tóthová, Andrea, Spinelli, Gustavo R (2011): Two new Patagonian species of Atrichopogon (Meloehelea) (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 2777: 61-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.206897
